dmca.title: A Violinist.com Comment
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]- I am sending you an email as I do not have your mailing
address. I am an attorney writing on behalf of [Private]. He has
called my attention to the material appearing on the Discussion Board of
your website. The vitrioloic message from [Private] is slanderous
and defamatory and completely inappropriate for inclusion on your
Discussion Board. [Private] is embitterred by the fact that [Private] found it necessary to expell him from his program. [Private] is
determining what legal action he may take for the damages inflicted by
this diatribe on his music institute. I would respectfully suggest that
you exercise reasonable editorial discretion as to the material you permit
to appear on your site's Discussion Board. I am specifically requesting
that the discussion of [Private] be deleted. As it currently stands,
if you "Google" [Private], the first reference that appears is your
Discussion Board. This has the potential for inflicting serious damages on
[Private] and his universally acclaimed summer Institute. I would trust
that, upon reflection, you would agree that this kind of material reflects
adversely on your site, as well. I f you wish to discuss this, I can be
reached at [Private]. Thank you. [Private]
